word: Perception Influenced by Physical Habits Controlled by Conscience.--Those who would have clear minds to discern Satan's devices must have their physical appetites under the control of reason and conscience. The moral and vigorous action of the higher powers of the mind are essential to the perfection of Christian character. And the strength or the weakness of the mind has very much to do with our usefulness in this world and with our final salvation.--RH, Sept 8, 1874. (MYP 236, 237.)
